00022 //---------------------------------------------------------
00023 //   x11EventFilter
00024 //---------------------------------------------------------
00025 
00026 bool MscoreApplication::x11EventFilter(XEvent* ev)
00027       {
00028       if (ev->type == KeyPress || ev->type == KeyRelease) {
00029             XKeyEvent* ke = (XKeyEvent*)ev;
00030             state = ke->state;
00031             code  = ke->keycode;
00032             }
00033       return false;
00034       }
